version_description:
Added "Use local timezone" feature and fixed some minor bugs.

If you have any "airing hour / date" related issues - please email at info@next-episode.net and it'll be fixed ASAP.

Multiple new features added:

+ Movies and Movies charts
+ TV Schedule section in Next tab
+ Search in Episodes tab
+ Upcoming Episodes notification (15 minutes before airing)
+ Updated Show Details a bit with cleaner layout

- Fix

This update adds iOS 10 compatibility for the widget and some new features and fixes:

For Pro Users:

+ Released Movies notification
+ Compact Widget version (on app icon 3d Touch)

General new features:

+ IMDb button on show

This is a quick update to add iPhone X compatibility.

Much bigger update is currently in the works.

- improved iOS 13 compatibility when running on an iPad
- fixed app crashing bug related to the calendar

This is a quick update to address some critical issues:

- added Widget Dark mode
- improved iOS 13 compatibility when running on an iPad
- fixed app crashing bug related to the calendar

Bigger, more feature rich update is in the works.

- fixed bug in My Movies section
- some iOS 14 compatibility fixes

- fixed bug in My Movies section
- some iOS 14 compatibility fixes
